availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky farmer. Virginia native. Married Dicy Kinnaird. Father of Eliza Kinnaird, Thomas Kinnaird, Samuel Kinnaird, and Sarah Kinnaird. Farmer in Warren County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District No. 2, p. 10. Find A Grave, "William Henry Kinnaird (1803-1878)," Memorial #43229668, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=43229668&ref=acom (accessed May 3, 2017).
